name: Archer Of God
description:
What is your choice of good? Join the Endless War of Good and Evil!
Punish the traitors of yours and rise to be the only archer who can end this war.

Join the Angel or Devil side to foster the level, perfect the skills and risk your life to protect your side!
Be nimble to dodge the arrows, be precise to aim your mortal enemy, since it being the only way to end this war.
Unleash the inifinite force of unique skill combinations as you are named to be the Saint Lord/Devil Lord.
You will long for the title of the "Archer of God" in the Eternal Heaven and Hell.

■ Easy Control in PvP Shooting Action Feeling the Real Hit!
■ Less Playtime, More Play Spice!
■ Perfect the Collections, Overwhelm with over Millions of Skill Deck!
■ Leap Shot, Multi Shot, Summon Granting Various Skill Combos!
■ Engage in the Holy War between the Angel and the Demon to Gain Special Buffs!

#Customer Support
